landing.subtitle: Easily and Professionally
landing.description: Comprehensive system for managing medical clinics with advanced security and protection technologies

features.advancedSecurityDesc: Complete protection of your data with international standards
features.timeManagementDesc: Smart scheduling for appointments and bookings

howItWorks.step1Desc: Create a new account in minutes with basic information
howItWorks.step2Desc: Add specialization, address, and medical license information

security.description: Advanced security system to protect your data and patient data with the highest international standards

items.encryptionDesc: Complete protection of sensitive data with AES-256 encryption
items.twoFactorDesc: Additional protection for your account with two-step verification
items.backupDesc: Secure backup of all your data

items.schedulingDesc: Advanced scheduling system supporting all types of appointments
items.patientManagementDesc: Comprehensive record of patient data and medical history
items.serviceManagementDesc: Easily add and modify medical services
items.reportsDesc: Comprehensive reports on clinic performance and statistics

patientExperience.description: Improve patient experience through modern tools and easy-to-use interface

items.quickBookingDesc: Simple and fast booking system for patients
items.remindersDesc: SMS and Email reminders before appointments
items.digitalRecordDesc: Comprehensive digital file for each patient with medical history

doctor1.name: Dr. Ahmed Mohammed
doctor1.text: Great platform that helped me organize my clinic professionally. The system is easy to use and saves a lot of time.

doctor2.name: Dr. Fatima Ali
doctor2.text: Bookings have become so easy! Patients love the system and find booking simple and fast.

doctor3.name: Dr. Khalid Abdullah
doctor3.text: Reports and statistics are accurate and help me make important decisions. Excellent performance!

landing.platformFeaturesDesc: Everything you need to manage your clinic efficiently and professionally
landing.testimonialsSubtitle: Real opinions from doctors using the platform
landing.faqSubtitle: Answers to your most common questions

faq1.question: Is the system free?
faq1.answer: Yes, registration on the platform is completely free. You can start using all basic features without any cost.

faq2.question: How do I protect patient data?
faq2.answer: We use advanced encryption and secure storage for all data. The system complies with international medical security standards.

faq3.question: Can I use the system on mobile?
faq3.answer: Yes, the platform is fully responsive and works seamlessly on all devices (computer, tablet, mobile).

faq4.question: How do I add my appointments?
faq4.answer: You can easily add your weekly schedule. Set available times for each day and the system will automatically manage bookings.

faq5.question: Is there a mobile app?
faq5.answer: Currently, the platform is available as a responsive website. We are working on developing a dedicated app soon.

faq6.question: What if I need help?
faq6.answer: Our technical support team is available 24/7 to assist you at any time. You can contact us via email or live chat.
